RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 28900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-win ners Of A Race Since November 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since October 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EAGLES CRY settled off the early pace racing just off the inside, moved up five wide into the upper stretch and finished well to just get up under strong handling. HORN OF PLENTY stalked the early leader, made a two wide bid near the quarter pole, took a narrow lead into the upper lane, dug in near the rail and just missed in a game effort. ALEXIS S chased the top pair, made a three wide bid through the far turn, dug between late and finished gamely to the wire. LEGAL DEAL stalked the pace, race along the inside around the far turn through the upper stretch, angled out four deep nearing the sixteenths pole and finished willingly to the wire. ROMANTIC GAMBLE lag early on to trail, raced five deep near the three sixteenths pole and had no late rally. BEST DEFENSE sprinted clear early and was empty near the quarter pole. Internal racing fractional times were unavailable.

ENTRY.NAME: Legal Deal
ENTRY.OWNER: Jagger Inc and Longball Stables LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Horn of Plenty
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 2 wide bid 1/4, dug in rail, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Eagles Cry
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 5wd upper stretch, finished well, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000, if for $22,500, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAVAGE DRAGON tracked the early leader early, urged into the far turn, dueled with Cali Heat through the far turn from the outside and edged clear late under strong handling. CALI HEAT dueled through the far turn near the rail, dug in near the eighth pole and gave way to the winner grudgingly. EMPTY MY POUCH was off slowly, advanced just off the inside through the far turn, raced six deep near the three sixteenths pole, gained ground late and closed in gamely to the wire. CHASIN' WHISKEY raced off the early going, raced along the inside around the far turn and made a mild late gain racing four wide. OUR ANDREW B settled off the early pace setters, swung seven wide into the lane and had not enough in the drive. TAPACHILL was slow early, saved ground and never threatened. REBEL INVASION was sent along from the inside and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Empty My Pouch
ENTRY.OWNER: Gumpster Stable LLC and Hoopie Stable

ENTRY.NAME: Our Andrew B
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, swung 7 wide, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Tapachill
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Savage Dragon
ENTRY.OWNER: Heimer William G and Wood Bob

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since October 15 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOUGHTON SHUFFLE prompt the early leader from the inside, raced three wide between in the drive, dug in and just got up under all out pressure. KEEPING IT COUNTRY stalked the pace, moved up five wide into the upper stretch and finished gamely to the wire. UNCLE DAR showed good early speed racing just off the inside, was clear near the eighth pole and weakened a bit in the final stages. YO NESSROUNDONKERN raced off the early pace, was six deep near the three sixteenths pole and moved up to improve position. LILTONYTWOPHONES stalked the pace from the outside, raced four to five wide around the far turn and flattned out in the drive. MAKE ME LUCKY was off very slow, lost a considerable amount of ground at the break, raced at the back after the poor start, raced four wide into the upper stretch and never threatened. RENEWING VOWS dropped back early, raced from the inside into the upper lane and had no rally. GET DOWN BROWN raced from the inside and never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Make Me Lucky
ENTRY.OWNER: Cannell Tom and Stites Christine S

ENTRY.NAME: Renewing Vows
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, inside upper stretch, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Houghton Shuffle
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt inside, eased out, 3wd between, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 27100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NANCY SPAIN set her own uncontested early pace, roused under briefly under a hand ride into the upper stretch and raced well clear to be a handily winner. INVEST WISELY was off slowly, made a four to two wide bid in the stretch run and moved up to improve position but was no match for the winner. B B QUEEN tracked the early leader, hard ridden between near the three eighths pole and weakened a bit through the drive. UPTOWN CHARLY GIRL dropped back early, raced six wide into the upper stretch and had no late rally. SHORT OF DINERO was off a step slow, stalked the pace from the inside and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Short of Dinero
ENTRY.OWNER: Deiter Kelly Lynn and Olsen Lisa M
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, stalked inside, fade

ENTRY.NAME: Nancy Spain
ENTRY.OWNER: O'Connor Mrs Charlie Duignan Gabriel and Ocean Reef Racing

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown Charly Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, 6wd upper stretch, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Invest Wisely
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly 4-2 wide bid, moved up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 14400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LONDON LADY rated along the inside, confidently handled through the far turn, made a good rail bid in the drive and got up under strong handling. MY SWEET SUMMER tracked the early leader from the outside, made a four wide bid near the quarter pole and finished gamely to the wire. CURLIN'S DOVE showed good early foot to set the early pace along the inside, had a clear lead near the eighth pole and weakened late. DISCO DAISY was coaxed along from the inside early and weakened. RIGHTOFFTHEBENCH stalked the pace from the outside, loomed four to five wide around the far turn and flattened out. LET'S GO MO lag early to trail, saved ground and had no rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Rightoffthebench
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside, 4-5 wide turn, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since November 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAKOTO set his own uncontested early pace and held well to be clear under strong handling. I'M NOT A BABY tracked the early leader from the inside and finished gamely to the wire. LUDO stalked the pace, raced four wide around the far turn and kept on willingly to the wire. STORMY FIRE raced off the early going, was near the inside nearing the quarter pole, shifted five wide and raced even late. SPIRITUAL GHOST sent into the first turn, trailed early and failed to respond. GREATEST WARRIOR tracked the early leader two deep and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Not a Baby
ENTRY.OWNER: Nomad Farm Training and Sales LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Ludo
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4wd far turn, kept on, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Spiritual Ghost
ENTRY.OWNER: Gardner Sean and MIH Affiliates LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 58. Claiming Purse 10000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 15. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRUSSIAN BLUE settled off the early going, advanced four wide through the far turn and drew off to well clear under steady handling. CANOOCHEE raced off the early going, made an early move three wide near the three eighths pole and was no match for the winner in the drive. TEACHER DRAMA dropped back to race mid pack early, was five wide into the upper stretch and had not enough. SWITCHRATTLENROLL stalked the pace from the outside, ridden three wide near the three eighths pole and weakened through the drive. BAMBOO GARDEN void of early speed, raced from the inside into the upper stretch and raced evenly. ALWAJD forwardly placed early on, checked sharply near the three eighths pole, raced five wide around the far turn and tired. ARCTICA showed good early foot and gave way. CIRCLE OF COURAGE stalked the pace, was done early and eased up on in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Bamboo Garden
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, inside upper stretch, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Alwajd
ENTRY.COMMENT: up closed, checked 3/8, 5wd far turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Canoochee
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, early move, 3wd 3/8, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Prussian Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 4wd far turn, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Circle of Courage
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, stopped, eased up on stretch,
